Common issues and solutions to help you resolve problems quickly.
Find solutions to common issues and problems you might encounter.
Getting errors during installation or build process.
Ensure you're using Node.js 18 or higher:

node --version
# Should show v18.0.0 or higher

# If you need to update Node.js
# Using nvm (recommended)
nvm install 18
nvm use 18

# Or download from nodejs.org
# If you need to update Node.js

# Clear npm cache
npm cache clean --force

# Try installing again
npm install

# If still failing, try with different registry
npm install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
# If still failing, try with different registry
Development server can't start because port 3000 is in use.

# Find what's using port 3000
lsof -ti:3000

# Kill the process (replace PID with actual process ID)
kill -9 PID

# Or start on a different port
npm run dev -- --port 3001
# Kill the process (replace PID with actual process ID)
# Or start on a different port
Changes to files don't trigger automatic reloads.
Check if you're editing files outside the project directory

# Stop with Ctrl+C, then restart
npm run dev

# Make sure Tailwind is properly configured
npm install @nuxtjs/tailwindcss

# Check nuxt.config.ts includes:
# modules: ['@nuxtjs/tailwindcss']

# Restart dev server after config changes
# Make sure Tailwind is properly configured
# Restart dev server after config changes
Markdown content isn't showing up on pages.

---
title: Your Title
description: Your description
---
Restart development server after adding new content files

# Clear .nuxt directory
rm -rf .nuxt

# Clear node_modules and reinstall
rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
npm install

# Try building again
npm run build
Check that all content queries use proper async data composables:
Build process runs out of memory.

# Increase Node.js memory limit
NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" npm run build

# Or add to package.json scripts:
"build": "NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' nuxt build"
Pages take too long to load.

<!-- Use Nuxt Image component -->
<NuxtImg src="/image.jpg" width="400" height="300" />

# Clear node_modules and reinstall
rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
npm install

# Check import paths are correct
# Use ~ for project root: ~/components/MyComponent.vue
Avoid using browser-only APIs in server-side code
For static generation, ensure routes are prerendered
Add debugging to your development environment:

# Add to .env
DEBUG=nuxt:*
NUXT_DEBUG=true

# Run with debug output
npm run dev
# Check browser console for client-side errors
If you can't find a solution here:
Contact support with detailed error information

npm run build
npm run preview
for warnings and errors during development
